@EnvAgencyAnglia @NorfolkPolice @BroadsBeat Eleven months for this case.  Sixteen months ago July 29th 2019 eels climbing out of water and dead fish in the river because of pollution in the Broads at Trowse. Nothing yet on reason or who is being prosecuted. Discrimination or selective prosecution!

@CleanUpTadworth @JSHKT20 @TadworthWalton @george_curry @RBBCLeader @LDPromos @Ju_Qu @GoddenAlison @T66018937R @DavidBinns7 @TBotting @SurreyWT @BritishHorse @carolinempepper @thankyou @WaltonForum @EnvAgencySE If a fly-tip is off the public footpath, then it's the responsibility of the landowner to clear it. They can be issued with a Community Protection Notice ordering them to do so. Such instances need to be reported to us and we'll then deal with them accordingly. Thanks. Shaun. 2/2

@CleanUpTadworth @JSHKT20 @TadworthWalton @george_curry @RBBCLeader @LDPromos @Ju_Qu @GoddenAlison @T66018937R @DavidBinns7 @TBotting @SurreyWT @BritishHorse @carolinempepper @thankyou @WaltonForum @EnvAgencySE Hello. On private land with a right of way through it, such as Sandlands Grove (which is a byway), it is the responsibility of the local authority to clear any instances of fly-tipping, as long as it is actually on that right of way. 1/2
Weâ€™re looking forward to welcome new students to work with us and our interdisciplinary research teams at @BIFoRUoB @drjoshlarsen @EnvAgency @BritGeoSurvey @metoffice https://t.co/k45bzbWppS

text: I caught up with the @EnvAgencyNW and @VolkerStevinUK  team about the progress that is being made with the #Egremont flood risk management scheme, which included some drone footage - below - where you can see the extent of the water storage being engineered #partnership https://t.co/HvjSmgfQ3H

@EnvAgencyNW have developed proposals for a #floodscheme to increase flood protection in Gosling Sike #Carlisle by increasing the culvert diameter.
